tns:patch.keyword: Add Number of indicators in global settings
tns:patch.author: timothygachengo

script.lang: INSERT INTO public.amp_global_settings (id, settingsname, settingsvalue, possiblevalues, description, section, value_translatable) VALUES (nextval('amp_global_settings_seq'), 'Number of indicators in M&E Dashboard', '5', 't_Integer', 'Number of Indicators that can be displayed in the M&E Dashboard', 'general', null)
